duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct air quality analyses and assess regulatory compliance for environmental management projects.
Develop and submit air quality permits applications and interact with state and local regulators for permit reviews.
Prepare emission inventory reports, evaluate air pollution control technologies, and implement climate change projects.
Assist clients with compliance programs, environmental management systems, and perform environmental audits.
Manage multiple tasks within scope/budget/schedule expectations and maintain successful client relationships.

education_certification.credential: BS in chemical, environmental, or mechanical engineering, science or related degree. E.I.T. preferred with ability to obtain P.E. within 5 years
